product_context.specs: Live view: 2K/1080p | Connectivity: Wi-Fi (2.4G & 5GHz) | Control: Monitor by app at anytime anywhere | Pan & tilt: 355°, 180° | Features: Privacy protection mode, Human motion/sound detection, Two-way audio talk, Night vision, Local storage
product_context.current_description:
See every corner. Know every moment.
• Crystal-clear 2K video reveals faces, pets, and packages with lifelike detail. • Night vision keeps watch after dark without switching on a single light. • Two-way talk lets you calm the dog or greet the kids from the grocery line. • Motion alerts ping your phone the instant something moves, so surprises become certainties.
Ask any smart speaker or glance at any smart display to pull up the feed instantly. The camera tucks neatly on a shelf, keeps power through one discreet USB-C cable, and syncs with every mobile device you already own.
Bring the whole home into view, and never wonder what's happening inside again.

goals.goal: Analyze product name effectiveness and suggest alternatives if needed
Extract 5 key features/benefits in Apple-like style focusing on homeowner outcomes

constraints.constraint: No unverifiable claims; no brand lore beyond prompt/context
Prefer outcomes homeowners feel: safety, time saved, comfort, energy savings, simplicity
Do not show internal reasoning; output final results only

instruction.action: Extract and present key features and benefits.
